# Template Submission Checklist

Thank you for contributing a new template to Spec2Cloud! Please provide the following:

## Description of Changes

<!-- Please provide a brief description of the template you're adding or changing -->

## Template README Metadata

- [ ] I have filled in all **mandatory fields** in the README.md with the structure defined in `templates/_template/`
  - **title** - Concise title (40 chars or less)
  - **description** - Brief summary (140 chars or less)
  - **repo** - GitHub repository URL with the template files
  - **authors** - GitHub handles of main contributors
  - **category** - Selected from: AI Apps & Agents | App Modernization | Data Centric Apps | Agentic DevOps
  - **industry** - Selected appropriate industry category
  - **services** - List of Azure services used
  - **languages** - Programming languages used
  - **frameworks** - Frameworks utilized in the template

## Additional Information (Optional)

- [ ] Added thumbnail image (16:9 aspect ratio recommended)
- [ ] Added video demonstration
- [ ] Added version number with CHANGELOG.md

## Instructions to use the template

- [ ] I have provided instructions to use the template in the README file of the specified repo.
